0P00006FYV.SI.long_name: LionGlobal Short Duration Bond Fund Class A (SGD) (Dist)
0P00006FYV.SI.summary:
The investment objective of the Fund is to provide total return of capital growth and income over the medium to long term, through an actively managed portfolio of Singapore and international bonds, high quality interest rate securities, real
estate investment trusts (âREITsâ), business trusts and other related securities.

0P00006HYG.SI.long_name: UOB United Global Portfolios - United Singapore Bond Fund
0P00006HYG.SI.summary: The investment objective of the Sub-Fund is to maximise returns over the longer term by investing mainly in bonds denominated in Singapore Dollars (issued by entities incorporated or domiciled globally) and bonds denominated in foreign currencies (issued by entities incorporated or domiciled in Singapore). Apart from investments in bonds, the Sub-Fund may also invest in money market instruments (denominated in SGD or foreign currencies), bond funds (including funds managed by the Managers) and time deposits in any currency. Investments shall be made in accordance with the CPF Investment Guidelines. There is no target industry or sector.

0P00006HYS.SI.short_name: United SGD Fund - Class A SGD A
0P00006HYS.SI.long_name: UOB United SGD Fund Class A SGD Acc
0P00006HYS.SI.summary: The investment focus of the Fund is to invest substantially all its assets in money market and short term interest bearing debt instruments and bank deposits with the objective of achieving a yield enhancement over Singapore dollar deposits.

0P00006O9V.SI.long_name: Nikko AM Shenton Horizon Singapore Fixed Income Enhanced Fund - SGD Class
0P00006O9V.SI.summary: The Horizon Singapore Fixed Income Enhanced Fund aims to provide income and capital growth by investing primarily in money market and fixed income instruments in Singapore.
0P00006O9V.SI.manager_bio: . Mr. Soon has been employed by Western Asset since 2012. Prior to joining Western Asset, Mr. Soon was VP, Portfolio Management at ST Asset Management from 2011 to 2012. Prior to joining ST Asset Management, Mr. Soon was Asia Fixed Income Analyst and Portfolio Manager at AMP Capital Investors beginning in 2011. Prior to joining AMP Capital Investors, Mr. Soon was Head, Fixed Income & Currency at DBS Asset Management from 2008 to 2010. Prior to joining DBS Asset Management, Mr. Soon was Investment Manager, Pacific Asset Management from 1996 to 2008.

0P00006OH3.SI.long_name: LionGlobal Singapore Fixed Income Investment A
0P00006OH3.SI.summary: The fund aims to achieve steady returns over time by investing primarily in bonds and other debt securities denominated in Singapore Dollars. In addition, the Fund may also invest in bonds and other debt securities in currencies other than the Singapore Dollar.

0P0000P28F.SI.long_name: Fullerton Short-Term Interest Rate Fund - Class B
0P0000P28F.SI.summary:
The investment objective of the FSTIR Fund is to achieve medium-term capital appreciation for investors. The investments of the FSTIR Fund will be broadly diversified with no specific industry or sectoral emphasis.
The investment strategy of FSTIR shall be to maximise returns via investment in Singapore Dollar and foreign currency denominated fixed income securities, of up to 5 years tenure, and money market instruments. The foreign currency denominated fixed income securities will be fully hedged back to the Singapore Dollar except for a 1% frictional currency limit, and will have investment-grade credit ratings of at least BBB- by Standard and Poorâs or Baa3 by Moodyâs (or their respective equivalents). The investments are to be made after analysing historic and expected interest rate movements.
FSTIR may also invest in FDIs for the purposes of hedging and/or efficient portfolio management (namely, managing risks) without leveraging the portfolio.
0P0000P28F.SI.manager_bio:
Melvin Lee, CFA, Vice President, and Portfolio Manager is a member of the Fixed-Income team. In his current role,
he is responsible for the management of our Singapore dollar bond portfolios and is the lead credit fund manger
covering credit research and strategy. He is also responsible for the management of CDO portfolios.
Melvin has nine (9) years of experience in the fixed-income market and joined Fullerton in 2006. Prior to Fullerton,
Melvin was a manager with Lion Capital Management, managing synthetic CDOs and doing credit analysis of global
corporate bonds. He also worked in UOB Asset Management, primarily covering the US and European corporate
bonds, and managing Singapore dollar bond portfolios as well as money market funds.
Melvin graduated from Nanyang Technological University with a Bachelor of Business Degree (Honours) in 1998. He
was awarded the NTU scholarship where he obtained his Master of Business (Banking & Finance) in 2000.

0P0000V29M.SI.long_name: Fullerton SGD Income Fund - Class A
0P0000V29M.SI.summary:
The investment objective of FSIF is to generate long term capital appreciation and/or income in SGD terms for investors by investing primarily in fixed income or debt securities.
The Managers seek to add value from interest rate accruals, selection of bonds and/or credits and duration management (optimisation of bond returns by selecting bonds with different terms to maturity). The Fund will invest in a diversified portfolio of primarily investment grade fixed income or debt securities having a minimum long term credit rating of BBB- by Fitch, Baa3 by Moodyâs or BBB- by Standard & Poorâs (or their respective equivalents) and cash.

0P0000X76W.SI.long_name: Eastspring Investments Unit Trusts - Singapore Select Bond Fund Class AD
0P0000X76W.SI.summary: The PRU Singapore Select Bond Fund aims to maximise total returns over time by investing primarily in Singapore-dollar denominated debt securities and foreign currency debt securities which will be hedged back into Singapore Dollars.
0P0000X76W.SI.manager_bio: Danny Tan joined Eastspring Investments in February 2004. Danny is a Portfolio Manager in the Fixed Income team and is responsible for managing and overseeing portfolios of our insurance clients, as well as credit-focused portfolios. Danny is a CFA charterholder and holds a Bachelor of Business in Financial Analysis (Hons) from the Nanyang Technological University, Singapore.
